text:
[Makara starts his encounter under Ravana's instructions.]

निकुम्भंनिहतंश्रुत्वाकुम्भं च विनिपातितम् ।

रावणःपरमामर्षीप्रजज्वालानलोयथा ।।6.78.1।।
meaning: निकुम्भम् Nikumbha, निहतम् killed, कुम्भं च Kumbha and, विनिपातितम् had been killed, श्रुत्वा on hearing, रावणः Ravana, परमामर्षी very furious, अनलोयथा like fire, प्रजज्वाल burning in anger
translation: On hearing that Nikumbha and Kumbha had been killed, Ravana was very furious and burning in anger.

meaning: नैरृतः Rakshasa king, क्रोधशोकाभ्याम् overtaken by anger and sorrow, द्वाभ्याम् both, परिमूर्छितःbewildered excessively, विशालाक्षम् broadeyed, खरपुत्रम् Khara's son, मकराक्षम् Makara Rakshasa, अचोदयत् sent for
translation: The Rakshasa king was overtaken by both anger and sorrow, bewildered excessively sent for broadeyed Makara, the son of Khara.

meaning: पुत्र son, मया by me, आज्ञप्तःcommand, अभिसमवनितः accompanied by army, गच्छ going, वनौकसः Vanaras, तां them, राघवम् Raghava, लक्ष्मणंचैव and Lakshman also, जहि kill
translation: "Son! commanded by me, you go accompanied by arm and kill the Vanaras, Raghava and Lakshmana aslo,

meaning: शूरमानी proclaiming as hero, खरात्मजःson of Khara, मकराक्षःMaka raksha, वचःwords, श्रुत्वा hearing, हृष्टः rejoiced, निशाचरम् Rakshasa, बाढम् इति good, अब्रवीत् said
translation: Rejoicing to hear the words of Ravana, proclaiming himself to be a hero, Maka raksha, the son of Khara said 'good'.

meaning: बली mighty, सःhe, दशग्रीवम् tenheaded, अभिवाद्य greeting, प्रदक्षिणंकृत्वाचापि also going round him as tradition, रावणस्य Ravana's, आज्ञया by order, शुभ्रात् early morning, गृहात् from the abode, निर्जगाम went out.
translation: Greeting the tenheaded Rakshasa and going round him according to tradition, the mighty warrior went out from the abode early morning by the command of Ravana.

meaning: खरपुत्रःKhara's son, समीपस्थम् nearby, बलाधक्षम् commanderinchief of the army, इदम् this, अब्रवीत् spoke, शीघ्रम् quickly, रथम् chariot, आनीयताम् brought, सैन्यम् army, त्वरात् quickly, आनीयताम् proceed
translation: Khara's son spoke to the commanderinchief of the army standing nearby 'Let the chariot be brought quickly and the army proceed'.

meaning: तस्य his, तत् वचनम् those words, श्रुत्वा hearing, बलाध्यक्षः commanderinchief, निशाचरः Rakshasas, स्यन्दनं च responded, बलंचैव army too, समीपम् near, प्रत्यपादयत् placed near
translation: Upon hearing those words, the commanderinchief of the Rakshasas responded and placed the army near him.

meaning: निशाचरः night ranger, रथम् chariot, प्रदक्षिणंकृत्वा after having gone round, सूतम् charioteer, आरुरोह ascended मेmy, रथम्chariot, शीघ्रम् quickly, आवह get, सञ्चोदयामास drive the chariot
translation: After having gone round the chariot he (Makara) ascended and said to the charioteer, 'let the chariot be driven quickly'.

meaning: अथ and then, मकराक्षःMaka raksha, तान् his, सर्वान् all, राक्षसान् Rakshasas, इदम् thus, अब्रवीत् spoke, राक्षसाः Rakshasa, यूयम् all of you, सर्वे all, ममmy, पुरस्तात् ahead, प्रयुध्यध्वम् fight violently
translation: Thereafter, Maka raksha spoke to all Rakshasas, 'All of you be ahead of me and fight violently'.

meaning: अहम् I, राक्षसराजेन by Rakshasa king's, महात्मना great self, रावणेन to Ravana, समरे in battle, तौ those, रामलक्ष्मणौ Rama and Lakshmana, उभौ both, हन्तुम् will kill, आज्ञप्तः by his order
translation: "I will kill both Rama and Lakshmana in the battle, by the order of Ravana, the king of Rakshasas."

meaning: निशाचराः night ranger, अद्य now, रामम् Rama, लक्ष्मणं च and Lakshmana, शाखामृगम् Vanara, सुग्रीवं च Sugriva also, वानरान् च Vanaras also, शरोत्तमैः best of arrows, वधिष्यामि will put an end
translation: "Now I shall put an end to Rama and Lakshmana, Sugriva and the Vanaras with the best of arrows."

meaning: अद्य now, सम्प्राप्ताम् going there, वानराणाम् Vanaras, महाचमूम् great army, अनलः fire, शुष्केन्धनमिव burns dry wood, शूलनिपातैः with these pikes, प्रदहिष्यामि will burn
translation: "Going there now, I will terminate the great Vanara army with these pikes just as drywood is burnt by fire."

meaning: मकराक्षस्यMaka raksha, तत् then, वचनम् words, श्रुत्वा on hearing, बलवन्तः mighty, ते they, निशाचराः Rakshasas, सर्वे all, नानायुधोपेताःarmed with different weapons, समाहिताःcame
translation: On hearing Maka raksha's words all the mighty Rakshasas came with different kinds of weapons.

meaning: कामरूपिणः who could change their form at will, क्रूराः cruel, दंष्ट्रिणः protruding teeth, पिङ्गलेक्षणाः yellow eyes, ध्वस्तकेशाःdishevelled hair, भयावहाःfrightful appearance, महाकायाः huge body size, ते they, ततः then, मातङ्गाःइव like elephants, महाकायम् of huge size, खरात्मजम् son of Khara, परिवार्य surrounding, हृष्टाःjoyously, वसुन्धराम् earth, चालयन्तःshaking, अभिजघ्नुःwent forward
translation: Those who could change their form at will, cruel, with protruding teeth, yellow eyes, dishevelled hair, of frightful appearance, huge like elephants surrounding the son of Khara went joyously forward shaking the earth.

meaning: कामरूपिणः who could change their form at will, क्रूराः cruel, दंष्ट्रिणः protruding teeth, पिङ्गलेक्षणाः yellow eyes, ध्वस्तकेशाःdishevelled hair, भयावहाःfrightful appearance, महाकायाः huge body size, ते they, ततः then, मातङ्गाःइव like elephants, महाकायम् of huge size, खरात्मजम् son of Khara, परिवार्य surrounding, हृष्टाःjoyously, वसुन्धराम् earth, चालयन्तःshaking, अभिजघ्नुःwent forward
translation: Those who could change their form at will, cruel, with protruding teeth, yellow eyes, dishevelled hair, of frightful appearance, huge like elephants surrounding the son of Khara went joyously forward shaking the earth.

meaning: तत्र there, आहतानाम् beating of drums, शङ्खभेरीसहस्राणाम्blowing of thousands of conches, क्षेवळितास्फोटितानां च clappings of arms, महान् great, शब्धः sound, समन्ततःe very where, अभूत् heard
translation: There was a beating of drums, blowing of thousands of conchs, clapping of arms and great sound was heard.

meaning: अथ and there, तदा then, तस्य his, सारथेःcharioteer, करात् hand, प्रतोदःlong whip, प्रभ्रष्टःdropped down, तस्यरक्षसः that Rakshasa, ध्वजः standard, सहसाsuddenly, दैवात् by divine will, पपात fallen
translation: There, the long whip dropped from the charioteer's hand and the Rakshasa's standard had fallen suddenly by divine will.

meaning: तस्य his, रथसंयुक्ताः yoke binding the chariot, ते they, हयाःhorses, विक्रमवर्जिताःgiven up their valour, आकुलैःfaltering, चरणैः feet, गत्वा going, दीनाःdesperate, सास्रमुखाः shedding tears, ययुःwent
translation: His horses yoked to the chariot went giving up their valour, faltering feet, desperate and shedding tears.

meaning: रौद्रस्य angry, दुर्मतेः evil minded, तस्यमकराक्षस्य that Maka raksha, तस्मिन् निर्याणे at his departure, सपांसुः crumbling dust, खरदारुणः dreadful and violent, पवनः wind, प्रवाति blowed.
translation: At the departure of evil minded and angry Maka raksha, dreadful and violent wind blew carrying with crumbling dust.

meaning: वीर्यवत्तमाः exceedingly valiant, राक्षसाः Rakshasa, सर्वे all, तानि them, निमित्तानि incidentally, दृष्टवा seeing, अचिन्त्य not taking into account, तौ those, रामलक्ष्मणौ Rama and Lakshmana, यत्र there, निर्गताःwent
translation: Seeing those portents incidentally and not taking into account those Rakshasas went where Rama and Lakshmana were.
